main event: An observer reported a small cloud-like object that rose and disappeared to the north over Sudan in November 1962.
interesting points: The object appeared to change course and travel eastward,It had a bell-shaped upper part and seemed to discharge small glowing white objects from its side,The observation lasted about 20 minutes,Local people reacted humorously, thinking it was a spirit,The report speculated whether it could be radioactive fallout from a nuclear test.
witness description: Observer described the object as a solid mass, grey in color, resembling a mushroom cloud and larger than typical clouds.
